com.pokerface.pokerapi.game

Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pokerface.pokerapi.game.GameState

  • @Entity
public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
    GameState stores everything necessary to know about the state of a game. It provides function to access that information. It exists within the GameRepository.

        bigBlind - the bigBlind amount
        minPlayerCount - the minimum player count before it starts
        defaultCashOnHand - the default cash on hand for a joining player
